movie.title: The Wanderer
movie.description_intro: Adaptation of the Anglo-Saxon poem The Wanderer, telling of a warrior's loss of a beloved Lord and his subsequent loneliness as he tracks across countries, exiled from a community.
movie.description_full: Adaptation of the Anglo-Saxon poem The Wanderer, telling of a warrior's loss of a beloved Lord and his subsequent loneliness as he tracks across countries, exiled from a community.

movies.title: Hunter's Creed
movies.summary: After losing his wife to cancer, Dave Bryant also lost his faith in God. In an effort to lift his spirits, Dave's old church buddies convince him to participate in the hunting show they've always wanted to make together. The group heads to a remote cabin and begins documenting their experiences. Before long, Dave senses a dark presence in the woods he's convinced is stalking him. But the other guys have no idea what he's talking about, and Dave begins to wonder if it's all in his head. The presence continues closing in, eventually bringing Dave face to face with death - and his faith.

movies.title: Beyond the Law
movies.summary: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.
movies.description_full: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.
movies.synopsis: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.

movies.title: Planes
movies.summary: Dusty Crophopper is a little cropduster plane with a fear of heights and a crazy dream of being a racer. While his friends need convincing, Dusty gets the training he needs from Skipper, a veteran fighter, and qualifies for the Wings Across the World race. In the event, Dusty finds competitors who soon learn that there is something special about this underdog as he is tested to his physical and emotional limits. In doing so, Dusty soon finds enemies, and more importantly friends, who are inspired by his dream. In the face of all obstacles, the winner of this air race will be anyone's guess.

movies.title: Nameless Gangster: Rules of the Time
movies.title_english: Nameless Gangster: Rules of the Time
movies.title_long: Nameless Gangster: Rules of the Time (2012)
movies.summary: On the verge of being fired, a corrupt customs official finds a haul of drugs and teams up with a vicious gangster to become the most powerful crime partnership in Busan.
movies.description_full: On the verge of being fired, a corrupt customs official finds a haul of drugs and teams up with a vicious gangster to become the most powerful crime partnership in Busan.
